data.title: Mafalda - Baby Name Meaning, Origin, and Popularity
data.meta_description: Mafalda is a girl's name  of Italian, Portuguese origin.  Mafalda is the 930 ranked female name by popularity.
data.text:
Mafalda

Italian and Portuguese variation of Matilda

"battle-mighty"

Mafalda Origin and Meaning

The name Mafalda is a girl's name of Italian, Portuguese origin.

Mafalda is nearly unknown in the English-speaking world, despite an appearance in Harry Potter. Indeed, it does have a witchy feel. Matilda itself is preferable, or her French form Mathilde, Spanish Matilde, or abbreviation Maud.

# 930 in the US

Mafalda Rank in US Top 1000

Mafalda Popularity
